settings.manage_data.save_data.title: Save data
settings.manage_data.save_data.descripti: Save your data to the cloud
settings.manage_data.download_compressed: Download a copy of your compressed data

sheet.import_data.title: Import data
sheet.import_data.already_synced: All addons in the cloud are already imported
sheet.wwyltd.title: Import backup
alert.log_out.title: Log out
alert.log_out.body: Are you sure you want to log out of Cloud Sync?
alert.delete_data.title: Delete data
alert.delete_data.body: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all of your data?
alert.save_data.title: Save data
alert.save_data.body: Are you sure you want to overwrite your data?
alert.unproxied_plugin_warn.title: Warning
alert.unproxied_plugin_warn.body: Installing unproxied plugins can be dangerous since they haven't been verified by staff. Are you sure you want to import them?
alert.clear_ignored_plugins.title: Clear ignored plugins
alert.clear_ignored_plugins.body: Are you sure you want to clear all ignored plugins?
alert.too_much_data.title: Too much data
alert.too_much_data.body: Your addons take up too much storage (**{storage}**) and cannot be synced to the cloud. Review the options below:
alert.too_much_data.antied.label: Reinstall Antied
alert.too_much_data.antied.desc: You have an old version of Antied installed, which is known to flood storage. Press to install the newer version (your settings will be lost).
alert.too_much_data.ignore_plugins.label: Review plugins
alert.too_much_data.ignore_plugins.desc: Look through your plugins and ignore plugins which may be taking up unnecessary storage.
page.ignored_plugins.title: Ignored plugins ({count})
log.import.reload_for_font: Font {name} was selected. Relaod Discord to apply changes.
